price: Gooftaan kee odoo fedhee, silaa nama hunda ummata tokko taasisa ture. Wal dhaboo ta’uu irraa hin deemanu.
arabic: وَلَوۡ شَآءَ رَبُّكَ لَجَعَلَ ٱلنَّاسَ أُمَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗۖ وَلَا يَزَالُونَ مُخۡتَلِفِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: walaw shāa rabbuka lajaʿala al-nāsa ummatan wāḥidatan walā yazālūna mukh'talifīna
